title: I Cut Ties With The Beauties That Always Made Fun Of Me, But It Seems That They Actually Love Me.
alternative_title: Itsumo Baka ni shitekuru Bishoujo-tachi to Zetsuen shitara, Jitsu wa Ore no Koto ga Daisuki Datta you da. ; いつも馬鹿にしてくる美少女たちと絶縁したら、実は俺のことが大好きだったようだ。 ; When I isolated myself from the beautiful girls who always make fun of me, I think they actually loved me. ; I cut ties with the beauties that always made fun of me, but it seems that they actually love me.
status: Itsumo Baka ni shitekuru Bishoujo-tachi to Zetsuen shitara, Jitsu wa Ore no Koto ga Daisuki Datta you da. ; いつも馬鹿にしてくる美少女たちと絶縁したら、実は俺のことが大好きだったようだ。 ; When I isolated myself from the beautiful girls who always make fun of me, I think they actually loved me. ; I cut ties with the beauties that always made fun of me, but it seems that they actually love me.
description:
Description :
        "I found someone I like so let's break up"With these harsh words the protagonist gets dumped by his GF. On top his Kouhai mocks him & his favorite Maid Cafe Girl treats him like a slave. That's it! He cuts ties with all of them. Little did he know all three meanies actually just hid their romantic feelings for him.(Manga Mogura)
